title: China Global Television Network
summary: China Global Television Network (CGTN) is the international division of the state-owned media organization China Central Television (CCTV), the headquarters of which is in Beijing, China. CGTN broadcasts six news and general interest channels in six languages.[1] CGTN is registered under the State Council of the People's Republic of China and is under the control of the Propaganda Department of the Chinese Communist Party.[1][2] General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party Xi Jinping described CGTN's goal as to "tell China's story well."[3]
